document_data.name: First Era of Skyfire
document_data.mainbody: The '''Era of Skyfire''' was a time in [[Faer√ªn]]ian history when the [[efreeti]] [[Memnon (efreeti)|Memnon]] and the [[djinni]] [[Calim]] brought their forces together against each other in twenty-two cataclysmic battles from {{Yearlink|-6500}} to {{Yearlink|-6100}}. [[Elf|Elven]] [[High Magic]] forcibly bound the two leaders and bound their elemental essences to the sky and earth respectively. The ongoing struggles of the two noble [[genie]]s created the [[Calim Desert]]. It was also known as the '''Genie Wars'''.
